reviewText: Begins with three sisters washing a car and disrobing, Then two sisters dress as French maids, African American sisters try on sleepwear, twins on a beach, twin brunettes work out, cover girls spray each other with water, blond twins dance, a slumber party of four, and a hot tub. Good, watchable!

PLAYBOY HAS TOPPED THEM SELVES WITH THIS RELEASE WITH ALL OF THE MOST SEXY GIRLS IN THE WORLD, YOU WILL SEE DOUBLE AS THE TWINS APPEAR ON THE SCREEN ... THESE SISTERS WILL NOT LEAVE ANYTHING TO THE IMAGINATION AND NOTHING IS LEFT OUT ... THIS IS A MUST HAVE AND SEE

Playboy / Twins & Sisters Too is fifty-one minutes and was released on DVD on June 15, 1999. This video is the follow-up to Playboy's Sisters. In that one you had at least three Playmates in it; in this video there are none. I am thankful that they did not call it Sexy Twins & Sisters Too or I would have to ask for my money back. Not all the ladies in this video were sexy; cute but not sexy. The Malone sisters return to this video. You have one more set of sisters then you do twins in this video.

SISTERS

Karen, Shari & Alina Clay\Sisters & Water-From a one piece bathing suit to stripping into full nudity one sister at a time
Lacy Forgey & Jennifer Baker\French Maids-From not so sexy French maid outfits to one sister undressing another sister to a repeat performance
Carolyn Cordonna & Leslie Olivan\Special Touch-Sexy nude bath
Melo & Mona Wong\Playful Nights-A mixture of sexy lingerie and nudity
Lucy & Kitty Whalen with Lacy Forgey & Jennifer Baker \Slumber Party-Four ladies taking off their nighties and fooling around in the nude. Who the other two are, I do not know. Focused more on the other two ladies then the Whalen sisters
Karen, Shari & Alina Clay \Champagne Dreams-Full nudity at an outdoor bubble bath

TWINS

*Mindy & Mandy Malone (were in Playboy's Sisters)\Sea Goddess-Full nudity at the beach
**Jackie & Christine Artecone\Workout Together-Sexy Nude Workout
Toni & Tammi McGeath\In The Country-Stripping down to sexy lingerie and then full nudity in the hay barn
*Deanna & Dawn Willis (the only two who did not talk)\Curtain Calls-Stripping off the sexy lingerie

This was a step down from Playboy's Sisters. Playboy / Twins & Sisters Too get a B+.

* Indicates Playboy Newsstand Models
** Jackie, but not Christine was a Playboy Newsstand Model

VHS Preview
Playboy's Girls of South Beach

Just like Sister, I can't believe no one ever reviewed this old classic. This is a very hot DVD. Another exception to the rule that Playboy DVD's bite .  This along with SISTERS is one of the few Playboy exceptions. These old DVD's don't have many special features, but the main program here is A#1 top shelf. You'll be glad you added this one to your collection.

For the most part, this is standard Playboy mush-core... until the scene with real-life sisters Carolyn Cardonna and Leslie Olivan. This scene is so hot, so erotic... it is by far the highlight of the tape. Very strongly recommended!
